iantbane was the favored weapon of Clangeddin Silverbeard, the dwarven deity of war and honor in battle.In Demihuman Deities, Clangeddins avatar wields two battleaxes, but these are unnamed. However, taking into account that fact that avatars of deities almost always carry their favored weapons and that the title of Clangeddin is the "Lord of the Twin Axes", they are assumed to be the same.
The avatar of Clangedin wielded two of these +4 battleaxes that were made of mithril, and could be thrown up to . As well as having a higher chance to hit the target and hurting them more than usual, the axes would magically return to the avatars hands.
